name: nfmo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0))
-| wnf(s1, wtru)
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

|- wnf(s0, wmo(s1, w0))
-| wi(wtru, wnf(s0, w0))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the at-most-one quantifier. Note that ` x ` and ` y ` need not be disjoint. (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)
